description: Try our easy to follow Vegan Toffee Apple Pudding recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Vegan Toffee Apple Pudding Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Using electric beaters, beat margarine, sugar and vanilla in a bowl until thick and pale. Stir in egg replacer mixture. Add flour and coconut cream, mixing to combine. Transfer batter to an 8cup ovenproof dish, add apple mixture and swirl through batter using a skewer. Scatter crumble over and bake for 1 hour or until just cooked through. Remove from oven and drizzle with 2 tbs extra golden syrup. Return to oven for 15 minutes or until golden. Scatter over coconut flakes, drizzle over remaining golden syrup and serve with extra coconut cream.

Remove from oven and drizzle with 2 tbs extra golden syrup. Return to oven for 15 minutes or until golden. Scatter over coconut flakes, drizzle over remaining golden syrup and serve with extra coconut cream.
